channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AWS re:Invent 2025: How to watch and follow along live
item.description: Amazon Web Services’ big annual event, re:Invent 2025, is getting into full swing in Las Vegas this week, and you can follow the keynotes live right h...

item.title: MKBHD’s wallpaper app Panels is shutting down
item.description: From the time Brownlee launched Panels in September 2024, the app struggled to find an audience of its own. "We knew it was niche … and ultimately, we...

item.title: Vego's Food Recycler Is the Cheapest We've Ever Seen it Right Now (2025)
item.description: If you like gardening or composting supplies, you won't want to miss Vego's Cyber Monday deals.

item.title: The Meta Quest 3S VR Headset Is the Cheapest It's Ever Been (2025)
item.description: The Quest 3S is down to $249 at different retailers for Cyber Monday, but pay attention to how they're bundled.

item.title: Construction workers are cashing in on the AI boom
item.description: "I pinch myself going to work every day," one 51-year-old says of his new supervisor role overseeing 200 workers at a data center site.

item.title: Shopify resolves outage disrupting merchants on Cyber Monday
item.description: Shopify was down for many merchants this morning. preventing them from processing transactions. It appears to be fixed now.

item.title: The Best Cyber Monday Soundbar Deals
item.description: Scoop up savings on our favorite soundbars from brands like Sony, Vizio, and Samsung.

item.title: Nvidia announces new open AI models and tools for autonomous driving research
item.description: Nvidia continues its push into physical AI with the release of a new reasoning world model and other tools for physical AI.

item.title: The Surface Laptop Has Dropped to an All-Time Low for Cyber Monday
item.description: Exclusive to Cyber Monday, Amazon has dropped the price of the most powerful configuration of the Surface Laptop to just $700.

item.title: Netflix Won’t Let You Cast Shows From Your Phone to Your TV Anymore
item.description: The streaming giant quietly removed the feature that lets you control content on your TV screen using a mobile device. The company says the feature wa...
